overview: Benjamin Nazarian is primarily responsible for Omninetâ€™s overall investment strategy. Benjamin currently serves as CEO and member of the Board of Directors of Stadco, a supplier of high precision parts and components for the defense and aerospace industry. He also serves on the Board of Directors of Paramount Scaffold, Plymouth Health, PWP Industries, and Texollini. Benjamin serves on the Board of Councilors of the Law Center at the University of Southern California and is a member of the Young Presidents Organization (YPO). He received his Juris Doctorate from the Law Center at the University of Southern California and holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting, Cum Laude, from the University of Southern California.
